lead_paragraph: Catskill Mountainkeeper applauds Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s decision to veto the proposed liquefied natural gas port off Long Island.

headline.main: Good Call on Long Island Gas Port
headline.print_headline: Good Call on L.I. Gas Port

snippet: Catskill Mountainkeeper applauds Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s decision to veto the proposed liquefied natural gas port off Long Island.
